abstract: Under the new alias King Krule, Archy Marshall will release an EP next month on True Panther, and he played as part of that label's showcase at Glasslands Gallery in Williamsburg.
snippet: Under the new alias King Krule, Archy Marshall will release an EP next month on True Panther, and he played as part of that label's showcase at Glasslands Gallery in Williamsburg.
lead_paragraph: Archy Marshall, nowhere near the end of his teenage years, sings like he's chewing a tough piece of meat, using half his mouth to get the sounds out.
